mapper.select: SELECT s.`id`, s.`conglomerate_id`, s.`itmes_id`, s.`staff_id`, s.`uptime`, s.`uptimeC`, s.`principal`, s.`content`, s.`schedule_type`, l.`itmes_name` as `itmes_name`, a.`staff_name` as `staff_name` FROM `attendance`.`schedule` s LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`conglomerate` z ON s.`conglomerate_id`=z.`id` LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`itmes` l ON s.`itmes_id`=l.`id` LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`staff` a ON s.`staff_id`=a.`id` WHERE s.`conglomerate_id`=#{conglomerate_id} order by s.`uptime` desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT s.`id`, s.`conglomerate_id`, s.`itmes_id`, s.`staff_id`, s.`uptime`, s.`uptimeC`, s.`principal`, s.`content`, s.`schedule_type`, l.`itmes_name` as `itmes_name`, a.`staff_name` as `staff_name` FROM `attendance`.`schedule` s LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`conglomerate` z ON s.`conglomerate_id`=z.`id` LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`itmes` l ON s.`itmes_id`=l.`id` LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`staff` a ON s.`staff_id`=a.`id` WHERE s.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} order by s.`uptime` desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}
